tool_description: Retrieves shipping and delivery data from multiple carriers and internal systems for a specified time period and filters.

start_date.description: Start date for data retrieval in ISO 8601 format

end_date.description: End date for data retrieval in ISO 8601 format

carrier_names.description: List of specific carriers to include

error_messages: Invalid date range: End date must be after start date and both must be valid ISO 8601 format.
Date range too large: Maximum allowed range is 365 days.
Carrier not found: One or more specified carriers are not recognized in the system.
usage: Provide start_date and end_date to retrieve shipping data. Optionally filter by specific carrier_names. Returns structured shipping records for analysis.

carriers_included.description: List of carriers included in the dataset

data_summary.description: Summary of retrieved data including date range and key statistics
